class.name: YEngine
class.brief_description: YEngine is a custom class for managing game engine functionalities in Godot.
class.description: YEngine provides various methods for managing game settings, handling button clicks, and finding resources within specified paths.

method.name: button_click_callable
method.description: Binds a callable function to be executed upon a button click event.

method.name: button_click_callable_if_modulate
method.description: Binds a callable function to be executed upon a button click event if the control's modulate alpha value is above 0.94.

method.name: find_resources_in
method.description: Finds resources within the specified path(s) with optional filtering by name.

method.name: find_resources_paths_in
method.description: Finds resource paths within the specified path(s) with optional filtering by name.

method.name: get_current_scene
method.description: Retrieves the current scene in the SceneTree.

method.name: get_menu_stack
method.description: Retrieves the stack of menu nodes.

method.name: get_menu_stack_size
method.description: Retrieves the size of the menu stack.

method.name: setup_node
method.description: Sets up the YEngine node within the scene tree.

members.member: Indicates whether button clicks are enabled.
Represents the timestamp of the last button click.

signal.name: changed_pause
signal.description: Emitted when the pause state changes.
